reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater beautiful, with one mentioning how the peplum adds a feminine flair, and they appreciate its thick fabric and smooth texture.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater. Great find!
items.body: Beautiful sweater, very nice, and comfortable as well. I'm sensitive and most yarns are scratchy, but this is soft. I am 5'6" and 132 lbs and ordered a small. Perfect fit. Read more
items.author: texasquilter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just right
items.body: 5'5" apple shape 170lb ordered large. Beautiful navy color and also light brown kinda camel color, both are just right not to loose or snug. Good quality, not thin or too heavy. Keeper. Read more
items.author: Donna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect if you're thin and small cupped.
items.body: So there's nothing "wrong" with this sweater; it's cute and soft. BUT if you're a curvy gal like me, this isn't actually very flattering. I'm 5'3" 143lb with a 34D chest. The sweater fit fine over my bust, but even for a shorty like me, it was rather short waisted. Probably the least flattering is the waist ruffle. It doesn't hang nice, rather it's bulky and looks like I'm storing another layer of roll fat under there. Between my boobs and the ruffle, I looked huge. This look would be beautiful on a thinner figure. Read more
items.author: Jess G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and easy
items.body: This was exactly what I wanted, a cute sweater appropriate for a holiday party. The back felt kind of sexy but not trying too hard. Waist was flattering. Could have been a little softer but certainly not uncomfortable. Would buy again for ease, cuteness and price. Read more
items.author: KatieMommaTris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice
items.body: Very pretty and stylish! True to its size and very good quality. Can be dressed up very nicely! Read more
items.author: Kate L

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but lots of material
items.body: Beautiful color, nice quality and style but too much material in the waist for me. If they had an xs for the petite girls, I would love it! Read more
items.author: Sharon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Sweater
items.body: All I can say is that this sweater is absolutely Gorgeous. When I first saw it I was attracted immediately. The style was perfect just what I've been looking for. It is so hard to find appealing clothes online so I read all the reviews before ordering. They were all good. I worried I wouldn't like the material or that it wouldn't fit properly...Boy was I wrong! It is true to size and the fit is like it was custom made. I love the style being belted with the ruffle. I tried it on right away and the fit was ultra perfect. The fabric is very soft and extremely comfortable. I would recommend ordering your regular size as this sweater is true to size. It is very flattering ...I tried it on with black stretch pants and it looked Great. I also could see wearing this with skinny jeans or even a skirt. You can dress it up or dress it down. I am thrilled that I ordered this sweater. It is well made and very comfortable. I would have to shop upscale stores to find this and not sure even if they would have it. Thank you Amazon for carrying this absolutely Beautiful sweater. Read more
items.author: LenG

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars The way the sweater fits is so awkward ðŸ‘Ž
items.body: My mom gave me money for Christmas and told me to splurge and buy myself something nice so I spent almost $50 on the sweater and I have tried over the last three years every which way to wear it and it just looks awful no matter what. Iâ€™ve tried it at 200 pounds and Iâ€™ve also tried it at 150 pounds and everything in between. Iâ€™m pear-shaped, so I have narrow shoulders, and I think that may be part of it but also, the fabric is extremely stiff. Thereâ€™s no nice relaxed vibe with the sweater. It just sticks out all stiff and doesnâ€™t hang right. Iâ€™ve been really mad that we wasted so much money on a sweater that I ended up hating. Because it was a gift from my mom, essentially, I never returned it and thought that I could figure out how to make it work, but I have not been able to make it work. Read more
items.author: Momoftons

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Navy, Blue, Ivory, Peach, Black, Camel, Orange, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
